Package it.unicam.cs.followme.util

Interface BehaviourMonitor<E,S>

Type Parameters:
E - entities
All Known Implementing Classes:
EntityBehaviourMonitor
public interface BehaviourMonitor<E,S>
Classes that implements this interface are classes which are responsible for keep tracking of entities movements and signaled conditions in the environment.

  • Method Summary

    Return the set of all the conditions currently being signaled by the entities
